availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Munfordville, Kentucky, attorney. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Helm Wood. Married Amelia Winlock Munford Wood. Father of Henry Wood, Henrietta Wood, and Amelia Wood. Clerk for the Circuit and County Courts of Hart County. Served on the Military Board of Kentucky from 1861 to 1862.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Munfordville, District 2, p. 131; Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), VII. Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1964, Ancestry, Hart County, 1876. Find A Grave, "George Twyman Wood (1796-1876)," Memorial #114277492, https://ww28XX, 2017).
